direction.raw_text: (into headset) We'll take delivery from here. ZAVITZ inches along, scared breathless. He looks back. No one. Maybe he was wrong. Dazed, ZAVITZ crawls to his feet as passersby watch speechless. Things happen fast. The cargo van rips from the curb but is suddenly blocked by a delivery truck. HORNS BLAST. HICKS, 30's and athletic, leaps from the van. Fears confirmed, ZAVITZ starts down the sidewalk, shakes off pain, and moves to a run. Except now there's someone in front of him. He's trapped. Reaching a doorway, ZAVITZ pushes. The door opens to-- INT. RESTAURANT SUPPLY SHOP - CONTINUOUS ZAVITZ charges through and kicks open a fire door. An alarm blasts as he exits to-- EXT. ALLEYWAY - CONTINUOUS A garbage truck screams up the alley. There's no way to outrun it. There's a fire escape above a dumpster. Breath rasping, he struggles on the dumpster, pulling himself up the ladder just as the truck OBLITERATES all below. ZAVITZ struggles and climbs. Reaching a landing, he pauses for breath... ...and sees HICKS and two others just moments behind. ZAVITZ grabs a fire escape door, tugs, pulls and bangs it open to-- INT. A DILAPIDATED HALLWAY - CONTINUOUS ZAVITZ hurtles by, trips, get up, runs again, adrenaline pumping as PURSUING SOUNDS near. He pitches down a staircase, shoves TWO PEOPLE and rips through-- INT. The ANALYST enters in the number. A MONTAGE OF IMAGES GAINING IN SPEED-- CLOSE on COMPUTER SCREENS showing in the harvesting of DEAN's electrical identity. His phone bills scroll by. Names, addresses, employment people called-- Months, years flashing by quickly. Other data banks are probed. Insurance policies, credit histories, video rentals, library checkouts, school transcripts, ATM transactions, tax returns...everything. Irregularities are red-flagged. A matching ZAVITZ ITEM is found. DEAN's banking info is red-flagged. He has large cash withdrawals with no matching purchases. His withdrawal dates match up with unaccounted-for cash deposits... ...in RACHEL BANKS' savings account. CLOSE ON PRINTER. Conclusions spill out labeled "RISK". More probes are recommended into the RACHEL BANKS/ROBERT DEAN money connection. CLOSE ON EYE BEING SCANNED - We HEAR a TONE. dialogue.raw_text: On another poster, a man's running shadow in a target bulls-eye with a caption reading: YOU ARE A SECURITY TARGET Beneath a sign reading U.S. North-East Coastal Region , an ANALYST reviews time-coded, digital SAT videos of Washington, D.C. As seen from space, the Capitol appears to be nothing more than a greyish mass. The ANALYST keys commands into his system. CLOSE ON MONITOR - The overhead SAT view of Washington moves in closer, soon streets are discernible, then cars and buses - then an accident in an intersection with flashing ambulance lights and a bus. A body lies twisted in the street - it's ZAVITZ. The ANALYST enters additional commands. The ZAVITZ/bus accident freezes, then plays in reverse as if recorded by the eye of God.  The scene continues reversing, following close on Zavitz as he back-tracks into Harrison's Department Store. INT. ANOTHER VIDEO LAB - SAME TIME CLOSE ON ANOTHER ANALYST facing three monitors showing additional views of ZAVITZ's escape as captured by a traffic camera, an ATM camera and the security inside Harrison's.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.ToD: THE KEYHOLE '12' SERIES MAKING THE WORLD AN HONEST PLACE

direction.raw_text: to 401. He's coming up. INT. LAW FIRM/CORRIDOR - DAY DEAN walks down the hall toward his office. He stops by PEERS as he enters his office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Morning, Mr. Dean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. Would you get me what I need for Zwernickii and the Bellmoth motions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And do me a favor. Find out what you can about Daniel Zavitz. We did some work for him a few years back and there should be a file. DEAN enters his office and turns his computer on. It BEEPS, BOOTS and loads. INT. BUILDING CORRIDOR - CONTINUOUS LEVIN approaches the men's room. A MAINTENANCE MAN cleans up broken glass and water by the door. A sign reads: CLOSED FOR MAINTENANCE. Levin turns and leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into concealed sleeve mic)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to 401. Doorstep's clear. INT. MEN'S ROOM - CONTINUOUS Two more MAINTENANCE MEN kneel in a stall adjusting a portable monitor and oscillator. They aim a directional antenna using slow, sweeping motions. CLOSE ON THE MONITOR displaying the intercepted signal. It's Dean's computer screen with text being typed in. The words are hard to read due to horizontal drift. After adjusting the antenna, the signal smooths. We PUSH CLOSER. The signal shows the current display of Dean's computer screen. We see Dean's O.S. command pull up his E-Mail. A prompt asks for a password. XXXXXXX appears. A switch is flipped. XXXXXXX becomes PUCCINI. Dean's "secure" file opens. Entries appear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: this is 401. Password's "Puccini." EXT. COURTHOUSE - DAY Establishing. A large, busy place. LAWYERS and AIDES bustle in and out of this structure. INT. COURTROOM - DAY A busy morning as ATTORNEYS wait their turn to present motions before the JUDGE. DEAN is seated next to LEVIN, making notes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispering) Dick Burns got a phone call this morning from someone wanting information on you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The police?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He said they were doing a credit check. Are you refinancing a loan?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You remember Daniel Zavitz?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He got hit by a bus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does that have to do with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I honestly don't know. ANOTHER ATTORNEY sits several rows back, watching the proceedings, briefcase in his lap. CLOSE-UP on the ATTORNEY's EAR with a mini-receiver. From it drift snippets of the DEAN/LEVIN conversation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Was Zavitz in trouble?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. A pulled back leather flap on the ATTORNEY's briefcase reveals the tip of a concealed microphone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think there was a connection to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus! I just told you. I don't know. EXT. COURTHOUSE GARAGE - DAY DEAN waits for the garage attendant to bring down his car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Dean? DEAN turns. TWO MEN, PRATT and BINGHAM approach him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pulling out a card) We'd like to ask you some questions about Daniel Zavitz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you people?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (handing DEAN the card) I'm an investigator with Pro-Tech Security.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I went through this with an investigator this morning. If I could--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Zavitz was involved in an extortion scheme. We believe he passed you sensitive materials, possibly with your knowledge, and we need to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He didn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We believe he did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're wrong.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have good reason to believe that he passed you--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If he passed me materials, I'd have them. I don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'd like to recover any materials Mr. Zavitz may have given you--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He didn't give me--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --otherwise we may have to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Otherwise you may have to what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'd rather not--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you. You may have to what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (beat) We may have to explore additional avenues. INT. TECH ROOM - NIGHT We HEAR a recording of the conversation between DEAN, PRATT and BINGHAM while we're CLOSE on an INK NEEDLE measuring Dean's voice stress levels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He didn't give me--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --otherwise we may have to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Otherwise you may have to what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'd rather not--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you. You may have to-- HICKS turns off the recorder. Standing with him is REYNOLDS, the Dean file and voice stress graph laid out before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's arrogant and threatening. Voice stress points suggest he's worrying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiding something?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was in his bag. Now it's not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Destroy his credibility before he goes public. Neutralize him. I don't want anyone listening to a word he has to say. Tell me about Rachel Banks. EXT. EXMOOR COUNTRY CLUB - EVENING Establishing. A massive clubhouse surrounded by expensive cars and tended grounds. We HEAR strains of Gershwin's "They Can't Take that Away from Me" from inside. INT. COCKTAIL LOUNGE - CONTINUOUS GUESTS mill about. DEAN and STACY are standing by the reception table where name tags and seating assignments are laid out. DEAN picks up a card that reads: MR. AND MRS. ROBERT DEAN - TABLE 122. JERRY steps over and puts his hand on DEAN's shoulder--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I talk to you a second?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Table 122?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I want to talk to you about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wrote a check for a thousand dollars. You guys didn't have a table that was in the kitchen? JERRY gently pulls DEAN to a quiet corner...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Congressman's very happy to have your support, but he's heard that there's an investigation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An investigation? It was a bus accident.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's heard that it's escalated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Into what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Bellmoth case. The FBI thinks there might be mob ties.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a labor lawyer. There are always mob ties.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just be cool. INT. DINING ROOM - NIGHT CLOSE ON and OLD MATRON carefully chewing her food near a table card declaring: 122. The gala swings everywhere but here. DEAN and STACY are the only other diners at the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand why Jerry couldn't clear this up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you know--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's got his priorities?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's just, clearly, some administrative snafu. I'm sure this is the worst of it. EXT. DEAN'S OFFICE BUILDING - DAY Establishing. A glass and steel high-rise reaching upward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Dean? INT. DEAN'S OFFICE - CONTINUOUS DEAN sits behind his desk as his secretary MARTHA enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Rachel Banks. DEAN picks up the phone-- INTERCUT WITH: INT. RACHEL'S CONDO - CONTINUOUS RACHEL cradles a portable phone to her ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) I got a call from my firm this morning saying don't come in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are reporters wanting to know about my relationship with you and how long I've worked for the mob. The mob , Bobby!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, look-- Before DEAN can respond, there's a knock at the door. PEERS sticks his head in--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake and Silverberg want you in the conference room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) Shit. INT. CONFERENCE ROOM - DAY DEAN sits in the conference room by himself. He waits. After a moment, SILVERBERG and BLAKE stride in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got a call this morning from a source I trust. The Post is running a lead this afternoon about your involvement in the Bellmoth investigation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't under--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've also been informed that the Grand Jury is going to call for an investigation into your affairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They want to hold you in Contempt for ethics violations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They claim you helped create a shell company for Sam Vollotti in Zurich and that through your continuing relationship, the Gambino family's been able to exert influence and provide false witnesses to discredit our case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, well, that's true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Except for the part about my setting up a company in Zurich and knowing anyone named Sam Vollotti and having any relationship whatsoever with the Gambino family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robert--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gimme a week and four guys from litigation and I'll have the Post pleading with us not to sue for libel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell us about Rachel Banks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stunned) Rachel Banks?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The attorney?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you two been having an affair? DEAN is speechless...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of a question is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A direct one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a professional relationship with Rachel Banks. She's the go- between for a private investigator I use.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's his name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you just call Brill directly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know who he is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm told you had an affair with Rachel Banks four years ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Told by whom?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Considering the enormous exposure to which you've subjected this firm, I'd think you'd do best to simply answer my questions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well considering what a colossal douche bag you are, David, maybe I'd do best to simply kick your ass all over the capitol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is bullshit . Someone's mixing up a bunch of half-truths to ruin me and to ruin my case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who would do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe Bellmoth. Maybe the unions. I don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well until we find, you're gonna have to take a leave of absence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're firing me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A leave of absence. Until we've sorted this all out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put David on it. He seems anxious to clear my name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck off. INT. DEAN'S HOUSE/FOYER - EVENING DEAN enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calling) Stacy! JENNY, early 30's, heads him off--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robert--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Stacy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She doesn't want to talk to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (beat) What are you talking--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She can't talk to you right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (beat) Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because she's reading the newspaper, you asshole. DEAN pushes past her and heads to the back patio-- EXT. BACK PATIO - CONTINUOUS STACY stares blankly, eyes red. A copy of The Post is beside her. A picture of DEAN and RACHEL, arm in arm, accompanies a headline. DEAN walks in--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stacy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How could you let me find out like this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stacy, I found out like this. This is the first I'm hearing of--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robert--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (reading) "Sources revealed an FBI investigation into a possible money laundering scheme that may have sent millions of dollars--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've seen it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (reading) "At the center of the investigation are well-known Washington-area attorneys Robert Dean and Rachel Banks."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah...look-- STACY whips the paper at him--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You swore !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have lunch with Rachel once a month. She's my connection to an investigator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you I didn't want you seeing her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You had an affair with this woman, Robert, we went to a fucking counselor for a year.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see her for business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You told me you weren't seeing her at all .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't want you to be upset. I shouldn't have lied. Stacy, there's nothing between me and Rachel Banks. STACY grabs another paper and shoves it across the table. DEAN picks it up. DEAN'S POV: A black and white surveillance photo of DEAN and RACHEL on a hotel balcony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The date stamp on the picture is last month . Is that where you and Rachel conduct business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shaking his head) It's not real... (to STACY) That's not me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, please--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not a real picture, Stacy, it's been doctored-up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you should leave now, Robert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stacy--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave this house. EXT. HYATT HOTEL - NIGHT Establishing. Downtown Washington, D.C. INT. REGISTRATION DESK - CONTINUOUS A busy night. DEAN stands at the registration desk facing a DESK CLERK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (returning card) I'm sorry, sir, this card's been declined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a brand new card.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe it's not connected yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (handing him another) Here, you can use this. The CLERK runs it through. Same result.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. He returns the card, embarrassed for Dean. DEAN turns to leave... ...and stops dead. He stares at the empty floor by a pillar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My suitcase--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My suitcase is gone. DEAN walks quickly around the area, looking at everything and everyone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sure we can locate it for you, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't count on it. EXT. BANK MACHINE - NIGHT DEAN stands at the ATM, waiting for cash. There's a short line of PEOPLE behind him. His bank card spits out. The monitor reads: Temporarily Unable to Process this Transaction
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pounding the machine) God Dammit! The waiting PEOPLE back away... EXT. CHEAP MOTEL - NIGHT A weathered sign reads: All Rooms $39.95 An O.S. TV DRONES the latest AT&T COMMERCIAL-- TV ANNOUNCER (soft and seductive) Have you ever tucked your kid in from a phone booth? You will-- INT. MOTEL ROOM - CONTINUOUS CLOSE ON AN OLD COLOR TV. The COMMERCIAL ENDS. A NEWSCASTER returns to deliver the late-night news.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on TV) In Richmond today, Senate Majority Leader Sam Albert paid a visit to promote the ten-billion dollar Anti-Terror Bill. The newscast cuts to SAM ALBERT, late 60's, standing on State Capitol Building steps delivering a speech to community leaders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on TV) America is under assault, and this time it's from within. The gangs, the terrorists, the drug lords, the cults... PULLING AWAY from the TV, we explore the room. Dimly lit and cluttered with tired furniture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on TV) It's a war like any other war. A war with victims and a war that requires courage and strength. Outside the window, a BUZZING NEON SIGN flickers red and blue. We finally end on DEAN, sitting on a sagging bed, rubbing his eyes...the newspaper with the doctored-up photo is sitting next to him. EXT. BUILDING - DAY Establishing. Italian area of Baltimore. A 40's era box-building. A sign reads: Italian/American Legion - Members Only INT. ITALIAN/AMERICAN LEGION - CONTINUOUS Thread-bare chairs and a couch. SAL and FRANKIE, both meaty guys in shiny shirts, sit facing DEAN, who stands before them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. I'm not sure I understand. You wanna fuckin' what ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd like to speak to someone about what's happening to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to SAL) What'd this guy say his name was?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Bobby Dean, the Jew lawyer who squeezed DePinto.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, that's not true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't squeeze DePinto?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I meant I'm Presbyterian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My wife's Jewish. But that probably doesn't matter right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it you want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone's trying to destroy my life, and I'd like to find out who.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll see if I can, you know, work things out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well we'd sure like to help you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You would?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. But we can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because we, and our associates, have paid out hundreds of thousands of dollars to shyster lawyers like you, because of shyster lawyers like you, and we'd just as soon sit back and sip a beer while you get ass-banged by as many people as possible. EXT. STATELY OLD BUILDING - DAY Establishing. A sign reads: The Audobon Society - National Headuarters
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He shot wildlife footage-- INT. AUDOBON HEADQUARTERS/EDITING BAY - CONTINUOUS MEG BURTON sits near an editing machine as two EDITORS review endless amounts of bird footage. DEAN sits next to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, but--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: don't see how he could've slipped you something that the FBI would be interested in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's my point.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I need to find out as much about Daniel as possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because my life is being ruined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daniel's life is already ruined. Maybe if you guys stopped thinking about yourselves for a change and-- EXT. THE GANG-PLANK BAR - DAY Establishing. The Baltimore water front. A crusty bar overlooking the bay. INT. BAR - CONTINUOUS Sunlight slashes blinds revealing a place that is wrong during the day. JIMMY, a beefy bartender, takes stock of the liquor while RACHEL sits in a dark booth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rachel? RACHEL looks up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. You're just what I need right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got a minute?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (getting up) It's really not a good idea for me to be seen with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's doing this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gotta go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (blocking the door) Will you hang on just a second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rachel? There a problem? She looks at DEAN for a moment...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. No problem. (to DEAN) Outside. EXT. HARBOR CENTER - DAY CLOSE ON a SURVEILLANCE CAMERA on a pole, sweeping, making automatic lens corrections.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a lot of people asking questions about you and me. We drift down to the harbor walkway, a greenbelt with quaint hotels and bars on one side, Chesapeake Bay on the other. DEAN and RACHEL are strolling the walk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The IRS contacted me this morning. They say my lifestyle and receipts exceed my income.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You being audited?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the last four years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My firm'll represent you. Free of charge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't work there anymore, Bobby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's temporary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bullshit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rachel--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're screwed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna fix it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me about Brill. INT. A ROOM - CONTINUOUS A TECHNICIAN eyes a recorder spin as a monitor shows a live feed from the park.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (through headphones) I can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (through headphones) You have to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (through headphones) I've never met him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (through headphones) Goddammit, Rachel, you assured me-- EXT. THE PARK - CONTINUOUS DEAN and RACHEL on their stroll--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you. When you needed information, I got it. You didn't care how.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did care how.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This conversation's over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you gonna do, Rachel? You gonna sit in a bar in Baltimore? You want your job back? You want a life?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have a life, Bobby. I'm in love with a married man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry about that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What makes you think it's you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a moron, you know that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. DEAN smiles...and after a moment, so does RACHEL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I need to reach Brill, I chalk the mailbox on 14th and Main. EXT. CITY STREET - DAY RACHEL is walking to the mailbox. She casually slashes the box with chalk and drops a letter inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When he sees the mark, he knows there's a drop. The location's always the same. EXT. BALTIMORE PORT - DAY Establishing. Wharves, ships, seagulls. A water-bus chugs dockside as PASSENGERS board for the trip across the inlet. DEAN stands in a ticket line with the other PASSENGERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The number twelve ferry to Glen Burnie. Tuesdays or Fridays. INT. FERRY - DAY DEAN takes a seat. Across the deck is Seat 74. RACHEL takes the seat and casually slides an envelope behind it, her actions obscured by a bag she carries. The ferry BLOWS its departure horn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The drop's behind Seat 74. I leave something, he picks it up later. The ferry churns water. RACHEL moves to a wind protected seat, leaving Seat 74 empty. DEAN keeps watch on the seat as he scans the paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any idea what he looks like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My guess is male, somewhere in his
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Wildlife footage, for God's sake. I
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: s or 50's. A MONTAGE of different people occupying Seat 74. A middle-aged DRUNK passed out in the seat. A TEEN-AGED boy with glasses chats with friends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Race, height, weight, you're on your own. An OLD LADY reads a book. She sees DEAN eyeing her and smiles nervously. DEAN returns to his paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now I don't know how he's gonna feel about someone tracking him down. He's reclusive. I'm sure he has his reasons. DEAN's alone now. The ferry docks for the night. The last passengers, TWO NUNS, disembark. DEAN rises to go. Brill's a no-show. INT. FERRY TERMINAL - NIGHT DEAN walks down the ramp. It's dark in the empty terminal. Not the best place at this hour. Up ahead, TWO MEN stand in the darkness, then kissing. Down another hall, SOUNDS OF NEARING FOOTSTEPS. DEAN detours into-- INT. MEN'S ROOM - CONTINUOUS Empty. DEAN stands at a sink, water running. He glances at the door. He splashes water on his face. Suddenly-- --DEAN's slammed forward, a silenced pistol is shoved into his ear, pinning his face to the mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus! What?! You want money?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut the fuck up. Hands frisk DEAN. Up and down the legs, behind the back and chest. A wallet is removed, ID's looked at - then returned. DEAN turns to see-- A MAN, early 50's. He sweeps a signal frequency locator over DEAN's body. The needle reacts at DEAN's foot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gesturing) Your shoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My shoe?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gimme the shoe. DEAN complies with the strange request as the MAN flips out a knife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brill?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brill's dead. He died of small pox when he was two and he was buried in a Kansas field. (prying away DEAN's heel) My name doesn't matter. CLOSE ON DEAN's HEEL - a hollow compartment reveals a miniature tracking device. The MAN removes it, then returns the shoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A tracker. Thousand yard range. They're close. The MAN reaches in a trash can, removes a potato-chip bag, wraps it around the tracker and flushes it down the toilet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon. "BRILL" goes through the window. DEAN eyes the window, not sure. He eyes the door. Same feeling. EXT. LOADING DECK - MOMENT LATER DEAN crawls through the window to a loading dock. "BRILL" motions him to follow as he moves off into the shadows. The sounds of the window OPENING behind them, followed by FOOTSTEPS. "BRILL" shoves Dean behind a dumpster and removes his gun as two men run by. The STEPS FADE. "BRILL" looks. They're gone. EXT. FERRY TERMINAL - NIGHT Establishing. A closed farmer's market by the terminal. Several cars are parked. One's a cab. "BRILL" opens the driver's door. DEAN grabs the front passenger door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. In back like you're a customer. INT. CAB - NIGHT "BRILL" sits in the driver's seat, eyes flickering to all views, as DEAN climbs in the back. "BRILL" flips on the meter and guns into traffic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It started with the information you gave me on DePinto. After we talked, he agreed to resign. Next, a phony detective asked me about Daniel Zavitz. Then an investigator questioned me about an extortion scheme they claimed Zavitz was behind. The FBI started looking into mob connections. A doctored picture in the paper. Overnight, I'm ruined. Wife. job, bank accounts, everything gone. "BRILL" eyes the mirror. A BLACK CHEVY appears several car lengths behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DePinto's dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh Jesus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They found him yesterday folded neatly in a car trunk. What about Zavitz? "BRILL" starts to weave in and out of traffic. He looks in the mirror - the Chevy's also weaving several cars behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know anything about Zavitz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said he was behind an extortion scheme.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: extortion scheme. "BRILL" whips the cab around a corner, accelerating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you were the last one to talk to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd he say to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd he give to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't bullshit me, I can save your life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm telling you, I-- The ride from hell gets worse as "BRILL" screeches another turn. The car ahead stops and "BRILL" screeches past on two wheels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just gave him my card.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He didn't give you an address? He didn't give you a phone number?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. Two nights later I was robbed. I'm pretty sure they were pros. "BRILL" takes an impossible left into another alley. The Chevy follows. "BRILL"'s good. The guy in the Chevy's better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um...who's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't know. Did you check everywhere? Maybe it was hidden in something. Maybe there was someone else--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone else?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you bumped into someone who took it and you didn't even know. The cab is rear-ended hard by the Chevy. Their necks snap back from the force.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit! WHAM! They're hit again. "BRILL" pulls out a communicator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 209 to anyone! I need some help here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you calling?! WHACK! "BRILL" back-hands DEAN with his fist, knocking him silly as WHAM!--the cab's rear-ended again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (trying again) This is 209! Does anyone copy?! Then "BRILL" sees that the alley empties into a busy street, then a bakery shop. He slams the brakes. Tires screech smoke but it's no use. The powerful Chevy pushes the cab, bumper to bumper, toward the street. "BRILL" grips the wheel. It's all he can do as the cab rockets into cross traffic and-- BLAM! They're broad-sided by a delivery truck. The cab is shoved sideways along the street and into a fire- hydrant, finally stopping under jetting water from the broken main. DEAN slowly opens his eyes. Water pours in everywhere. "BRILL" is sticking halfway through a window, not moving. Seeing "BRILL"'s pistol, DEAN grabs it and crawls from the wreckage. EXT. STREET - NIGHT DEAN climbs from the wreck as BYSTANDERS approach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look out! He's got a gun! They back away as DEAN gets to his feet and looks around. Off to the side he sees the Chevy, waiting like a coiled snake. DEAN limps into the crowd. He rounds the corner to ANOTHER STREET and now he's running with all he's got left. INT. DEAN'S HOUSE/STUDY - NIGHT STACY is at the desk looking at the latest edition of the paper, which now has a photograph of DEAN and RACHEL walking in the park from the day before. The phone rings and STACY reaches for it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Hello? INTERCUT WITH: INT. HOTEL LOBBY - CONTINUOUS DEAN stands at a pay phone--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Stacy, don't hang up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know what I'm looking at Robert?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stacy--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm looking at a picture of you and Rachel taken yesterday .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, but listen--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Was that doctored-up, too?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I was with her yesterday. I want you to take Eric and go to our parents house. I want you to do it right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I went to the grocery store. My ATM and credit cards didn't work. I couldn't buy food.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I went to the bank to see why. They said you emptied our accounts--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wasn't me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is science-fiction Robert! The manager showed me the transfer notice with your signature on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stacy, somebody's trying to kill me. Now goddamit--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father's put me in touch with an attorney. He'll be-- A hand suddenly clicks down the phone hook. DEAN turns to see a MAN, late 50's, gruff and alert. It's the guy driving the Chevy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put the phone down. Do as I say. DEAN does nothing, temporarily frozen. A pistol jabs him hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, alright-- DEAN replaces the phone. The man removes DEAN's gun. Nearby, two PEOPLE chat at a restaurant hostess desk, unaware.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move to the elevators. DEAN does but is suddenly redirected through a roof- access door. INT. VAN - NIGHT A TECHNICIAN sits in a van jammed with high-tech surveillance gear. HICKS is next to him, a phone pressed to his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We just picked up his call. INTERCUT WITH: INT. OFFICE - NIGHT REYNOLDS, dressed in a tux, presses his cellular to his ear, while behind him MARSHAL and SHAFFER, also in tuxedos, have a heated discussion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: They said he was behind an
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: minutes ago you said we had him. What in hell's goin' on out there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) He had help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Help from whom? (he hears the answer) Christ. EXT. HIGH-RISE ROOFTOP - NIGHT Eight stories up and deserted. The lit dome of the Capitol building shines like a beacon in the D.C. skyline. DEAN suddenly slams against a wall--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget me, forget what I did for you. Don't ever mention my name or try to contact me again. Get it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know you, I don't know your name, I don't know what the hell you did for me except hang up on my wife and slam me into a wall, but I'm getting pretty fuckin' sick of this! Get it?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seat 74.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pause) You're Brill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You knew the deal. No contact.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who was that other guy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of many people who would live a word with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are they?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've heard of the National Security Agency?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do they have to do with this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's who they are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The NSA?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're crazy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (starting to leave) Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You drive a black BMW, license plate SRK1339?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (reaching in his pocket) I clipped this from your wheel well just before they towed your car away. BRILL pulls out a disk-shaped object the size of a walk-man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a SAT-tracker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what that means.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like a LowJack, but two generations ahead of what the police use. It pulses at 230 Giga-Hertz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what that means.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Giga-Hertz. They use that band for the Aquacade Spy-SAT uplinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what that means.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It means the NSA can read the time off your wristwatch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are they after me ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I knew, they'd be after me . Which they probably are right now. 'Bye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. What do I do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pal, you're cooked. It's over. What you did, who you were...that's done. I'd find a quiet job somewhere shoveling snow. A helicopter hovers near the Washington Monument. BRILL eyes it cautiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't they just identify themselves and tell me what they want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're spooks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what that--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exposure. They can't have it. They wanna learn what you know and then deal with it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know anything .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I gonna do?! I mean, like, for the rest of my life ?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, if you live another week I'll be impressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you gave me some work over the last year. We'll call it even. BRILL turns to leave--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (blocking the exit door) What if I find out what they're after. You know these people, I don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you won't. Now move--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll pay you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (taking out his pistol) They froze your accounts. Get outa my way. DEAN continues blocking the door, maintaining calm even as BRILL's pistol is pressed firmly to his forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got a hundred-thousand dollars in jewelry in a safe-deposit box under a third party name. BRILL looks at the ground. Torn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many years have you been hiding from them? How many years have you been running? (beat) What'd they do to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pause) If you find something, chalk the Baltimore Sheraton mailbox and go to Temperanceville. It's South of Salisbury. (giving DEAN his pistol) And take this. And with that, he's gone. DEAN eyes the gun. He walks to the ledge, looking at the city. DEAN'S POV: Several vehicles quietly pull up to the building. MEN storm out an move inside. DEAN quickly backs away. INT. BUILDING CORRIDOR - NIGHT DEAN races for the stairwell two steps at a time. He hears the SOUND of a DOOR OPENING somewhere below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to 301. Floor one secured. Moving to two. DEAN retreats upward, then he hears SOMEONE COMING DOWN. Trapped. He opens the door on '3' and is about to run when he sees a security camera directly above. Grabbing a fire extinguisher, he pulls the pin. Spray coats the lens. Then he yanks a FIRE ALARM. A HORN BLARES. DEAN runs for the second stairwell when he sees JONES stepping out. DEAN looks back at the stairwell he left. That door's opening as well. Trapped. Using the extinguisher, DEAN smashes the glass door to an office and goes inside. JONES starts to enter when a shot rips into the wall, convincing him otherwise. He retreats as the BLARING FIRE ALARM STOPS. DEAN races through the suite of offices trying locked door after locked door. Finally, one opens and he rushes in and tries to lock it behind himself. No lock. He sees the MEN and they see him. He slides a desk against the door, then backs away, pistol ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (disturbingly calm) Open the door, Mr. Dean. There's nowhere to go. We'd just like to talk. Seeing a phone, DEAN grabs it. No tone. Just a RECORDING of Nancy Sinatra's song "These Boots are Made for Walking".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It'd be easier for all of us if you just come out. Nothing'll happen. DEAN heaves a coffee table up on the desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's quite hopeless what you're doing, Mr. Dean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear to God I'll shoot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (chuckling) I think you might be over-reacting there, Mr. Dean. We just want to talk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go ahead. I hear you fine. The door pushes in--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said I'll shoot! The door keeps pushing. DEAN FIRES high. The pushing stops. Then DEAN hears the distant sound of SIRENS approaching. DEAN rips off his sweater, takes out a lighter, and sets the sweater on fire. He throws it into a garbage can and tosses styrofoam cups in on top of it. The pushing starts again, but before DEAN can fire, a small cylindrical device drops into the room. A STUN GRENADE. DEAN ducks as a BLINDING FLASH rocks the room. The window is blown open. Smoke billows out. DEAN, temporarily blinded and deaf, struggles to a ledge as fire engines arrive. INT. VAN - CONTINUOUS Fire trucks, police cars and an ambulance arrive beneath DEAN as HICKS watches from his van.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't fuckin' believe this! (into radio-mic)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to all units. Everyone out! Now! We'll take him at the hospital. INT. AMBULANCE - NIGHT DEAN sits in back with a PARA-MEDIC, covered in soot, breathing hard through an oxygen mask as the ambulance WAILS and weaves through traffic. He looks through the rear window to see-- TWO CARS FOLLOWING, keeping pace. Off to the side, RFK Stadium is emptying, a Redskins game is over. DEAN rips off the oxygen mask--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell him to stop the ambulance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa there, fella. Just take it easy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell him to stop the ambulance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now you're a little shaken up, but we're gonna get you on your feet in-- DEAN whips out his pistol and shoves it in the PARAMEDIC's face--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the driver) --stop the ambulance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. EXT. STREET - NIGHT The ambulance pulls over and the back doors fly open. DEAN leaps out into the crowd. The OTHER CARS pull over and PRATT and JONES exit. They scan the area and see DEAN descending a stairwell marked: METRO. INT. METRO STATION PLATFORM - NIGHT DEAN stands at the end of the crowded platform. PRATT and JONES work through the CROWD as the train pulls in. DEAN slides on board. The departure HORN sounds. JONES and PRATT step on. INT. METRO - NIGHT DEAN huddles in the back car, panic-breathing, as PRATT and JONES move through the cars searching for faces. DEAN looks for an out. He sees an emergency stop handle. He YANKS it forward. PASSENGERS yell. The brakes lock and SCREECH. The train slows. Then stops. DEAN opens the door. And jumps. He looks around. Just black curved track in either direction. He starts running. Then he hears it. The horrible SCREECHING of an approaching train. Trapped. On one side, the train he left. On the other, a wall. He runs down the track with all that's left. PRATT and JONES reach the open door and see the oncoming train bearing down on DEAN. They duck in as the train SWISHES by. DEAN lays flat between the tracks, his face kissing greasy ground as the train screeches over him. Tons of angry steel are teasing his shirt fabric. Then it's over. The train's gone. DEAN's alive. He gets up to see PRATT and JONES leap to the tracks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (under his breath) I hate these guys. Then he sees an "EMERGENCY ACCESS" sign beaming in the darkness. A God-send. DEAN runs for it. EXT. METRO EMERGENCY ACCESS EXIT - NIGHT PRATT and JONES fly out the door and into a park. It's empty. Quiet. No Dean anywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm confused about something. Maybe you can help me out. EXT. TERRACE - CONTINUOUS The Lincoln Memorial is seen in the distance. REYNOLDS has broken off PARTY GUESTS and paces in his tux, an encrypted cellular phone pressed to his ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I sit on top of the greatest intelligence gathering organization in human history. Why can't I bring in a man whose name is in the fucking phonebook ?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's clever. He had help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's clever? He had help? (beat) Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, I'm sorry. I didn't realize you were hoping to be transferred to a weathership outside Greenland.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just meant--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't care if he's Solomon with Saint Joseph sitting in his lap . I want the tape and I want him. Now is-- A WAITER with a tray steps out onto the terrace...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the WAITER) Yes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Puffed cheese?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I also have tiny pizzas and mushrooms stuffed with--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do I look like I want a tiny pizza?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then let's assume I don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes sir. The WAITER goes back inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Now is that clear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes sir. REYNOLDS disconnects, breathes deeply, and goes back to the party. EXT. RACHEL'S CONDO BUILDING - NIGHT DEAN watches from the shadows. It seems quiet. He's about to move for the entrance when he sees-- A cigarette lighter flame-up inside a parked car. TWO MEN sit inside, watching. DEAN retreats into the shadows. EXT. RACHEL'S CONDO - BACK ENTRANCE - NIGHT Quiet. DEAN listens through the door and hears nothing. He KNOCKS softly. No reply. He tries the doorknob. It opens. INT. RACHEL'S KITCHEN - NIGHT DEAN enters. The place is still.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rachel? No answer. DEAN drifts through the living room. A lamp is knocked over on the floor. DEAN keeps moving into the bedroom. He stops in the doorway - eyes fixed inside. DEAN'S POV: RACHEL lies on her stomach, naked in bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (approaching) Rachel? She doesn't respond. He touches her. Nothing. He turns her over. Her face is frozen, eyes open, neck purpled and bruised with signs of strangulation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh God-- DEAN wants to throw up but holds it down. Then, under a night table, he sees a shirt. He grabs it. DEAN'S POV: An oxford button-down. The inside collar is stamped with a dry-cleaner's marker reading: R. DEAN. Panic overtakes horror as DEAN quickly searches for anything else of his that may have been planted inside the apartment. Under the bed - a cufflink. In the bathroom - a hairbrush. On the desk - documents with his name on them. DEAN shoves everything into a garbage bag. Grabbing a towel, he retraces his steps, wiping his prints from everything he touched. Exiting, he wipes off the doorknob as-- A NEIGHBORS DOOR OPENS. A COUPLE stumbles out, laughing, kissing...and noticing DEAN leaving Rachel's condo. INT. UNDERGROUND PARKING GARAGE - NIGHT JERRY walks alone through the large underground garage on the way to his car. He pauses, thinking he's heard something. Nothing. He continues walking. He reaches his car. Suddenly someone comes up behind him fast. JERRY spins-- --it's DEAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispering) Jerry--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Christ!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ssh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the NSA. They're the ones doing this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The NSA's doing this 'cause they think I have something. And they killed--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calm down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They killed Rachel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pause) Rachel's dead?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My stuff's all over her apartment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're framing me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would they--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. I mean--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would the NSA-- DEAN I don't know!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're tired.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jerry--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You gotta--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, listen to me. You gotta let me bring you in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I-- JERRY You gotta let me bring you in to the police.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I won't make it to the police. They won't let me get there. You go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To the cops?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To the NSA. Make a deal. Tell 'em to stop. Tell 'em I don't have what they're after. Make a deal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby, you're in way over your head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go to 'em, Jerry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So do I! JERRY looks at the ground for a long moment...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. No, it's okay. DEAN starts to leave...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby? Piece of advice?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turn yourself in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jerry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go fuck yourself. EXT. STREET - EARLY MORNING Establishing. A quiet street in Dean's neighborhood. Several REPORTERS are camped in Dean's driveway entrance, sipping coffees. Farther down the street, a JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE is parked. The driver waits and watches. EXT. BACKYARD - SAME TIME DEAN sneaks between two large houses, ducking by windows and scaling a fence. Somewhere a DOG BARKS a warning as DEAN plows through a large hedge, entering the backyard to his home. INT. DEAN'S HOUSE/KITCHEN - SAME TIME DEAN quietly unlocks the door and enters. He listens. The house is quiet. Empty. INT. DEAN'S FOYER - DAY KEYS JINGLE in the front lock. The door opens and STACY enters. The TV suddenly REMOTES ON - VOLUME LOUD. She turns as DEAN approaches fast--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robert-- DEAN's hand cups her mouth as he pulls her into a pantry closet. INT. PANTRY CLOSET - CONTINUOUS DEAN (barely a whisper) Listen to me. The house is bugged. So we gotta be quiet, okay? STACY nods understanding. DEAN slowly removes his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispering) Is Eric in school?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Has anyone been by? Police? FBI?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just reporters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish you'd gone to your parents like I asked you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is my house. Nobody's kicking me out of my house. I picked those drapes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think anybody wants the drapes, Stacy, I think the drapes are okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to your head?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was in a car chase and a small explosion. Now listen to me: The
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is behind this. They think that guy I told you about, Daniel Zavitz, they think Zavitz gave me a tape or computer chip of some kind that could be damaging to them. So they're doing all these things electronically . The bank records, the surveillance. They're the ones who broke into the house. Now I know there's no reason to believe me. But I love you. And I love our son. So just believe me anyway. (pause) Please. STACY gently touches his forehead where he's been cut...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does that hurt?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stacy-- She grabs him and kisses him. The kiss lasts a good long time before STACY smacks him on the arm--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you they could do this. I told you they had this kind of capability and that with this anti- terrorism it would be just another--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stacy...Stacy...maybe now isn't the best time for the I-Told-You-So speech. She kisses him again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry I didn't believe you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I opened the present you got me from Harrison's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You opened the thing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lingerie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was for Christmas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was missing you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're as bad as Eric. I've got an entire family of people who root through-- It dawns on him...everything starts coming together...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...who root through...uh...presents, and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh Christ. INT. JEEP GRAND-CHEROKEE - DAY The DRIVER continues to watch the area. Then-- DRIVER's POV: THE RANGE ROVER flies out of the driveway, tires SCREECHING as it speeds through the quiet neighborhood. The REPORTERS stare at each other a beat-- --then leap for their cars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into sleeve-mic)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to 501. Rover's fleeing west on Sutton. Driver appeared male !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (radio effect) What's the wife's '20'?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's off location with a friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright - move! 501 - all units. Take him down! EXT. STREET - CONTINUOUS Unmarked cars of various descriptions rapidly appear from nowhere giving chase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (radio effect)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to 501, I've got the eyeball. He's approaching Ridgeview, we'll take him at the intersection. The RANGE ROVER speeds through the neighborhood. Suddenly, two cars are out in front, blocking the way. The Range Rover swerves and breaks as two more cars rip up behind, boxing it in. An un-marked Trans-Am lags behind, keeping reporters at bay. Doors fling open. JONES and THREE MEN, all in plain clothes, pistols and MAC-10 aimed at the Range Rover. Nothing happens. The MEN move closer-- JONES grabs the door and rips it open, revealing Dean's PISS-FRIGHTENED NANNY behind the wheel in Dean's trench coat and hat. JONES YANKS her out, puts her hard to the ground, gun jammed to her head, as other search the Range Rover for Dean. EXT. DEAN'S DRIVEWAY - CONTINUOUS DEAN drives the Nanny's rusted, low-rider Dodge out of the driveway. He pauses and looks. The streets are empty. He turns onto the street and calmly drives away. EXT. ELEMENTARY SCHOOL PLAYGROUND - DAY Establishing. A playground jammed with kids. A kickball game's in progress. ERIC waits his turn to kick. TRACY, a college-age teaching assistant comes over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eric? ERIC looks up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your father's here. EXT. SCHOOL BUILDING - DAY DEAN stands at the edge of the playground in clean, casual clothes. ERIC runs over, face glowing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do I know you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where've you been?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Having an adventure. I can't tell you about it right now, but I'll tell you about it soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you and mom getting a divorce?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. We're never getting a divorce. We were having a fight. It happens sometimes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who won the fight?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Men don't win fights with women, son, I'll tell you about that sometime, too. In the meantime, I've got a question for you, and it's incredibly important that you tell me the truth. Under no circumstances will I be angry with you. This is a total Get-Out-Of- Jail-Free card. Ready?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you take anything --anything at all--out of those Christmas bags I brought home last week. ERIC hangs his head...busted...then shouts to a GROUP OF KIDS on the playground...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shouting)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !! DYLAN comes trotting over, carrying his backpack...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Mr. D., what's happenin'?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dylan, I was just asking Eric if--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, God, I knew it was stupid, I knew we'd get caught. But the Gameboy was just sitting there. Right on top of the bag. Yes. Yes. We took the GameBoy out of the bag, but with every intention of putting it back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pause) You're a tough nut to crack, Dylan. DYLAN hunts through the backpack as DEAN and ERIC looks on. All kinds of junk flies out--candy, comics, game- cartridges--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was broken when we found it, I swear. I tried fixing it for you. I even put in new batteries. (pulling out the GameBoy) The screen scrambles whenever you boot up. I'd try to get your money back. DEAN eyes the pieces of the GameBoy, knowing that somewhere in the puzzle of plastic and chips is the key to his problems. EXT. BALTIMORE SHERATON - EVENING PEDESTRIANS walk on the sidewalk. A MAN comes along and drops a few letters in the corner mailbox. From the other direction comes DEAN. Without stopping, he casually slashes the mailbox with chalk. INT. MOTEL ROOM - NIGHT DEAN's asleep. There's a SOFT SHUFFLING SOUND. The CAMERA EXPLORES for the source, moving by the windows, flashing neon, a TV and finally, the door. We PUSH CLOSER as a MULE TOOL snakes under the door. The tool pops upright against the door's inside. The strap drapes over the doorknob and tightens. The doorknob turns and opens. SOMEONE slips in-- CLOSE ON DEAN asleep. A HAND covers his mouth. DEAN's eyes go wide. Then he sees it's BRILL...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispering) Get dressed. We're leaving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispering) You could knock on the door, you know, and I'd open it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move it. EXT. CAPE CHARLES - 4 A.M. Establishing. The 10-mile Chesapeake Bay Bridge crosses the Bay like a serpent worming toward distant Norfolk. Traffic is thin at this hour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dean, the attorney recently under investigation for a money laundering scheme, was seen leaving Ms. Banks apartment late last night. We PUSH IN on a TOYOTA PICK-UP truck heading south. INT. PICK-UP - CONTINUOUS BRILL drives with DEAN riding shotgun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Police are seeking-- BRILL ejects as cassette from the dashboard and hands it to DEAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I taped it off the 11 o'clock news.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you were worried about me. That's nice, I appreciate--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was worried about my hundred and twenty 'K'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We said a hundred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The price rises with the temperature and right now you're smokin'. But you're right, you should shop around and get the best price. I'll just let you out here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (agreeing) One-twenty. BRILL checks the rear-view mirror. BRILL's POV: Car headlights following in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you call anyone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean did you call anyone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, my wife is understandably--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I called my wife!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd I tell you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't use my name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd I tell you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I called from a payphone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd I tell you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You told me no calls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you no calls. BRILL does a bootleggers U-turn. Several cars pass by in the opposite direction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't get it. They go through your phone records. They fuckin' monitor everyone you called in the last--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't use my name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I'll bet that threw 'em off the scent. I sure hope you covered the mouthpiece with a handkerchief and used a funny voice! BRILL turns off the headlights, does another U-turn, pulls off on an emergency road and stops. He turns off the engine, rolls down the window, looks up into the night sky and listens. BRILL's POV: A cloudy night. Silent except for the water and a distant fog-horn. No sounds of aircraft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking up as well) I don't hear anything. (on BRILL's silence) Maybe you're wrong. BRILL is staring upward...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A hundred and fifty. INT. NRO KEYHOLE-12 LAB - CONTINUOUS Re-establishing. A massive, dark place filled with glowing monitors. CLOSE ON A MONITOR - displaying a live SAT feed showing a thermograph image of Brill's truck. The color heat image of BRILL looking upward is fairly clear. He pops his head back into the truck and pulls onto the road. The satellite continues tracking the truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a consumated marriage. INT. TOYOTA - NIGHT BRILL drives along a high fence surrounding acres of empty warehouses, docks and rust-bitten fences. He's still on constant alert - looking for sign of their presence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The NSA's been in bed with the entire tele-communications industry since the 40's. They've infected everything: Banks, computers, phones, mail, name it. (stopping the car near the gate) The more technology we buy into, the easier it is keeping tabs on us. It's a brave new world. (handing DEAN the keys) At least it better be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you know so much?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: None of your business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You used to work for 'em, didn't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was a traffic analyst. DEAN gives him a look that says, "I don't know what that means".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I intercepted phone calls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How'd you get around the tap orders?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They can tap anything as along as it's an airwave intercept. Cellulars and pagers your kid can do. (driving through) Hard-line calls we'd pick off the relays as they were being fed into ground cables or fired up to the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: s. We'd suck in everything. All foreign, most domestic. (DEAN re-closes the gate) Domestic was my group. Druggies, radicals, loud-mouths. Anyone we wanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (climbing back in) How'd you have the manpower to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (driving again) Meade has 18 underground acres of computers. They scan every phonecall for target words like "bomb" or "President". We red-flag phone numbers or voice prints...whatever we wanted. When the computers found something, it was bounced to comparative analysis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was twenty years ago. With digital? They can suck a salt grain off a beach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why'd you leave?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was '72. I figured we had enough problems without monitoring a Berkeley kid's class schedule. So I sold my story to Ramparts and split.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They come after you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shrugging it off) Well...there'd be too much disclosure to prosecute me. So they ruined my records and made sure I'd never hold a real job again. The pick-up stops by a long two-story warehouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like Detroit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome to Santa's Workshop. INT. WAREHOUSE - NIGHT BRILL and DEAN enter the 2nd story of a large, empty structure. DEAN is carrying a crumpled, brown paper bag. In the center of the cavernous space, a windowless, cinderblock room built on 5-foot supports.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I call it the jar. No phone or utility lines going in. BRILL opens a side door revealing a mini-generator. He pushes the start button. The generator HUMS to life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Self-contained. Unplugged from the world. (opening Jar door) Nothing for a wire bug to piggy- back in on. That leaves only transmitters and signal sweep for those. (turning on the light) Now let's see what we got. DEAN tosses the paper bag to BRILL, who empties its contents (the pieces of the GameBoy) on to the table. EXT. DOCKS - DAWN DEAN sits alone, smoking a cigarette, and watching Norfolk rise from dawn's fog. In the distance we see BRILL coming down from the warehouse toward DEAN. He stands behind DEAN for a moment before...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is one ugly sunrise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pause) It really is. (pause) Did you find anything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. (beat) Take a walk with me. DEAN gets up and joins BRILL. The two of them start in the direction of the second warehouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember when Senator Hamersley died in an accident up near Shenandoah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The NSA killed him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus. Do you have proof?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, actually, you have proof. Could you walk a little faster please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the warehouse. They're hiding in a duct on the third floor. When we go back inside, they're gonna kill us. When they notice that we're moving toward the car, they'll come running out of the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Kay, well, could you walk faster, please. INT. WAREHOUSE - CONTINUOUS JONES and THREE MEN are huddled in a duct.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (through radio) They're heading to the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move it. JONES and the three men start down the corridor, guns drawn. EXT. THE SECOND WAREHOUSE - CONTINUOUS DEAN and BRILL are kneeling beside the Chevy, letting the air out of the tires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Empty 'em 'till they're almost flat. And turn your head. There might be some debris flying your way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? And with that, THE FIRST WAREHOUSE EXPLODES, sending a fireball of debris in all directions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They shouldn't have come without calling first. BRILL jumps into the Chevy, turns the key and the engine ignites. DEAN leaps in. BRILL stomps on the gas and tires screech. The Chevy hurtles through the warehouse toward a shut garage door. BRILL clicks a remote. The door rises. OUTSIDE THE WAREHOUSE - The Chevy roars outward, screams around a corner, then speeds down a road lined with warehouses. DEAN looks down an intersecting road to glimpse a Saturn sedan gaining on a parallel road.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's your gun? They pass an area with no warehouses. The Saturn turns, heading straight at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back at the warehouse. The Saturn pulls on the road behind them. The MAN in the Saturn leans out and fires an assault rifle. The side window by Dean's head shatters. BRILL one-hands the pistol and checks the load.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: the pistol) Gimme that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're driving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those are Feds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (taking the pistol) I didn't see a warrant. Did you see a warrant? The Chevy enters a narrow lane, the Saturn right behind.
